Therefore you shall speak <S%H559><s%> to them this word: <S%H1697><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Every bottle <S%H5035><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with wine: <S%H3196><s%> and they shall tell <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H3045><s%> Do we not certainly know <S%H3045><s%> that every bottle <S%H5035><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with wine? <S%H3196><s%>

Then you shall tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H4390><s%> I will fill all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land, <S%H776><s%> even the kings <S%H4428><s%> who sit <S%H3427><s%> on David <S%H1732><s%>'s throne, <S%H3678><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> with drunkenness. <S%H7943><s%>

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> and give ear; <S%H238><s%> don't <S%H1361><s%> be proud; for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> before he causes darkness, <S%H2821><s%> and before your feet <S%H7272><s%> stumble <S%H5062><s%> on the dark <S%H5399><s%> mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and, <S%H6960><s%> while you look for light, <S%H216><s%> he turns <S%H7760><s%> it into the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> and makes <S%H7896><s%> it gross darkness. <S%H6205><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> and to the queen <S%H1377><s%> mother, <S%H8213><s%> Humble yourselves, <S%H3427><s%> sit down; for your headdresses <S%H4761><s%> have come down, <S%H3381><s%> even the crown <S%H5850><s%> of your glory. <S%H8597><s%>

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> those who come <S%H935><s%> from the north: <S%H6828><s%> where is the flock <S%H5739><s%> that was given <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H8597><s%> your beautiful flock? <S%H6629><s%>
